feed.no_discussions: No discussions yet. Be the first to start one!
feed.no_posts: No posts yet. Be the first to share something!

actions.delete_post_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this post? This action cannot be undone.
actions.delete_comment_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this comment? This action cannot be undone.

users_table.verify_user_confirm: Are you sure you want to verify {{username}}? This will display a verified badge next to their name.
users_table.unverify_user_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove verification from {{username}}? This will remove their verified badge.
users_table.restore_user_confirm: Are you sure you want to restore {{username}}'s account?
users_table.ban_user_confirm: Are you sure you want to ban {{username}}? This will prevent them from accessing most features.
users_table.delete_user_confirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete {{username}}? This action cannot be undone and will delete all of the user's posts, comments, and other data.
users_table.make_admin_confirm: Are you sure you want to make {{username}} an admin? This will give them administrative privileges.
users_table.make_owner_confirm: Are you sure you want to promote {{username}} to Owner? This grants them full system access.
users_table.remove_owner_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove Owner status from {{username}}? They will be demoted to an Admin.
users_table.remove_admin_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove {{username}}'s admin privileges? They will be demoted to a regular user.

reports_table.resolve_desc: Are you sure you want to resolve this report? This will delete the reported content.
reports_table.reject_desc: Are you sure you want to reject this report? The reported content will remain.
